original: @135a me'i zug rdu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs /
analyzed: @135a me'i zug rdu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs /
translated: Dhāraṇī for Pacifying the Pain of Burns

original: bsil mdzad chu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bsil mdzad chu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the cool water deity!

original: aom bhra ma ni bhra ma ni /
analyzed: aom bhra ma ni bhra ma ni /

original: dzha ri bhra ma ni sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dzha ri bhra ma ni sv'ah'a /

original: zhes lan bcu gcig brjod de mchil ma byugs na mes tshig pa'i zug rngu zhi'o //
analyzed: zhes lan bcu gcig brjod de mchil ma byugs na mes tshig pa'i zug rngu zhi'o //
translated: If one recites this eleven times and applies it with one's saliva, the pain of burns will be pacified.

original: me'i zug rdu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: me'i zug rdu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī for Pacifying the Pain of Burns is complete.
